channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Waste bin overflowing, 24th August
item.description:
The bin is overflowing and cant be used, this appears to be an issue with lots of bins in Beckenham currently

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Crescent, Beckenham, London

item.title: Smelly drain, 24th August
item.description:

item.description:

Large chair dumped on the pavement. Has been there for over a week.

item.title: Bus stop dangerous angle, 24th August
item.description:
Health and safety risks Pedestrians are using the main road to walk on as the pavement is blocked. Seen many people walking into main road as no.pavement space The bus stop is leaning at a hazardous angle and there is a temporary bus stop sign below this ..so people waiting just below this danger. This looks as though has been reported early August and no action taken
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Croydon Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
The car has been left there for some time
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Vanbrugh Hill, East Greenwich, London

item.title: Trees & bushes overhanging pavement, 24th August
item.description:
Trees & bushes overhanging pavement therefore reducing width of pavement severely as there is a post box and a sign post situated on the pavement outside this property.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Highland Road, Shortlands, London

item.title: Lots of fly tipping near our door, 24th August
item.description:
There has been various bits of rubbish near our front door 295A Walworth Place for the past couple of weeks. people have been dumping things there and the street cleaners haven't been cleaning them up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 301, Walworth Place, Walworth, London

item.title: Park bench beoke, 24th August
item.description:
This playground bench has been vandalised and broken a couple months ago and has been reported to the council numerous times but has not yet been fixed, it is a great hazard to all little kids playing daily in this estates playground.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hindhead Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More household rubbish outside aden lodge, 24th August
item.description:
Piles of household rubbish outside Aden Lodge. Again. I report this almost daily. It is a dumping ground. People coming out of the Bebop pub - think they are staff - are dumping stuff there as well as Aden Lodge residents.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Aden Grove, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tanner's Hill Dumped Chairs Blocking Pathway, 24th August
item.description:
Tanner's Hill Accessibly issue on pathway across rail bridge due to several dumped chairs and wooden boards. Reported on Love Clean Streets from 14/8/25, however cases were closed without clearing up. More chairs have been dumped here since.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tanners Hill, New Cross, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Upper Brockley Road, New Cross, London

item.title: Abandoned Office Chair, Grey Planks and Excess Litter, 24th August
item.description:

item.title: Open and overflowing commercial bin AGAIN from Pepe's commercial waste, 24th August
item.description:
We didn't go one single day without Pepe's shop not following the commercial waste council rules that requires bin to be closed and not overflowing. Something needs to be done with this - either fix for good or remove their license and close this shop. They have been doing this for 18 months now. We had enought.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Woolwich Road, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uneven surface, 24th August
item.description:
Uneven road surface causing vibrations and trembling in nearby homes whenever heavier vehicles pass, a distracting nuisance for residents in adjacent flats causing discomfort

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 766, Holloway Road, Archway, London
Report on FixMyStreet
